Principles

Our team of experienced professionals is committed to delivering results that exceed our clients' expectations.

All our service engineers are trained and certified by relevant engine makers.

The main principles of our work are:

  • Innovative technologies

    Efficiency, saving resources and speeding up processes

  • Safety

    Reduces the risks of danger and provides peace of mind and confidence in the future

  • Еfficient

    More results with less effort, optimizes the use of resources and time

  • Сost-effective

    Achieve maximum results with minimum expenditure of resources

  • Main Engine

    Overhauling (all makers)

  • Riding Squads

    For paint, repair or welding

  • Dry Dock Teams assisting

    On special retrofit or repair projects

  • On-site technical repairs

    for all types of vessels, including emergency repairs and maintenance services

  • Structural analysis and repair

    including welding and fabrication services

About us

RAPIDTECH is a leading provider of maritime engineering services and technical repairs for vessels.

Our company was founded in 2023 by a team of experienced maritime professionals with a passion for delivering the highest quality service to our clients.

  • Highest quality

    As a relatively new service provider, we aim to deliver the highest quality to our clients to build a reputation for excellence in the industry, serving clients worldwide as a partner of trust on time and onv budget.

  • Long-term relationships

    We believe in building enduring long-term relationships with our clients and we take immense pride in consistently delivering exceptional results that consistently exceed their expectations.

Our Values

We оfer a comprehensive range of maritime engineering services:

  • Safety

    01

    Safety is our top priority. We are committed to ensuring the safety of our team, the crew onboard, and the environment.

  • Integrity

    02

    We conduct ourselves with the highest level of integrity, honesty, and transparency. We believe in doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.

  • Excellence

    03

    We strive for excellence in everything we do. We are dedicated to delivering the highest quality service to our clients, on time and on budget.

  • Collaboration

    04

    We believe in working collaboratively with our clients, partners, and stakeholders to achieve our shared goals. We value open communication and teamwork.

  • Sustainability

    05

    We are committed to sustainability and minimizing our impact on the environment. We believe that, by being responsible stewards of the environment, we can create a better future.

  • Values

    06

    Our values are more than just words on a page - they guide everything we do. By living our values, we can create long-term relationships with our clients and make a positive impact in the world.
